body_html: If you search for RegisterGradient in the python directory, you'll see all the places we define the gradients of various ops. The gradients are defined by Python code, so they aren't available from pure C++ as yet (we hope to change this at some point).
body_text: If you search for RegisterGradient in the python directory, you'll see all the places we define the gradients of various ops.  The gradients are defined by Python code, so they aren't available from pure C++ as yet (we hope to change this at some point).
body: If you search for `RegisterGradient` in the python directory, you'll see all the places we define the gradients of various ops.  The gradients are defined by Python code, so they aren't available from pure C++ as yet (we hope to change this at some point).
